subject: Testing for Spring MVC Portlet
msgSnippet: Hi All, I ve setup a project for portlet using Spring MVC Portlet application. Now I need to add testing capabilites using JUnit, my goal is so I don t need to
messageBody:
Hi All,
I've setup a project for portlet using Spring MVC Portlet application. Now I need to add testing capabilites using JUnit, my goal is so I don't need to deploy every time I make some changes e.g in the Controller.

Thanks
